Reviews.Content: women st patricks day night booked twobedroom apartment single beds bathrooms kitchen etc found 66th floor facing west view awesome little fear heights spacious hotel location literally 10 minutes walk chinatown cockle bay wharf harbourside george street plenty relax separate lounge balcony simply couldnt walk onto perfect overnight friends families visiting smoke
